full_title_(бүтэн_гарчиг): *, ,DPAL DUR KHROD BDAG PO LA GSER SKYEMS 'BUL NAS KHRAG ZOR 'PHEN TSUL CHOM RKUN CHINGS MDZAD MTHU LDAN ZHAGS PA ZHES BYA BA BZHUGS SO, ,
